Q: Why doesn’t this project have more steam? 

A: People will come and go. Hard to find the gems, but this is a long term play here. Market is not rewarding A-List art. We have high quality ideas coming -- don't think any other project has anything of this type.

Q: Could you guys explain a bit more about the future value of the Zodiac Capsules? Will there be any special benefits of holding an entire set of the 12 Zodiac Capsules?

A: Good times are coming for sure.

Q: Does the team like the idea of tokens? 

A: We have played around with it but ultimately we want to find other ways to reward holders without the use of tokens for a variety of reasons.

Q: Can you tell us more about the @LivesOfAsuna collaboration?

A: @ZumiDraws is a good friend. We lended some Capsule House IP in exchange for WL spots if that interests you. We're going to be thoughtful but diligent in offering future WL opps.

Q: When is Capsule House going to be an animated TV series or feature film?

A: We're building a world where our IP is used for interesting things - this all comes back to the IP. Multiyear vision.

Q: Should I leave a capsule on a nifty gateway?

A: No you should not leave a capsule on nifty. It will not qualify towards the 30+ days holder’s raffle due the nature of nifty’s ‘wallet’.

Q: Layer 2 Thoughts/Strategy?

A: Has to fill in an actual technical point for us. If there's anything cool we can pull from Layer2, please let us know.

Q: Seerlight, how accurate is the transition usually between creation in the mind and transference to artwork?

A: Before I start I have a clear picture, but some are lost in translation. As the process goes on, I add on to it so that they come out the same or even better.

Q: Any efforts on building community engagement with each other vs. with the Capsule House team? 

A: Capsule Council will be the first branch of this. Want conversations to be more than just speculation of how to improve the community.

Q: Will the 3D models be chibi avatars, rigged and animated? Or is it more bringing of Seerlights worlds to life in 3D?

A: More the former, something usable in games or whatever the next big thing is. The 3D model is of the capsule character. PFP will have a more mature look.

Q: Do you guys have any plans with integrating capsules into www3?

A: Will reach out. A lot of stuff is going into 3D and we are in the process of working on 3D assets, so you can be represented later on in the future. All about future proofing.

Q: Can you guys explain more about the Seerlight Art Installations on the Roadmap?

A: Holders will be given the opportunity to see how amazing their art is. They are the best kept secret of blue chip art right now. More opportunities to expand on this as covid gets better.

Q: Seer had mentioned possibly rewarding minters who never sold. Still something that could happen?

A: Could definitely happen. :)

Q: Any plans in the future #CapsuleVerse for mythic capsules?

A: Yes! There will be a couple additional features to reward those holding a capsule with a mythic trait.

Q: What is the possibility of staking Capsules and a token with no financial value?

A: Not an efficient way of distribution, no need to make you guys stake to claim.

Q: oksami, how many other projects are you working on at once?

A: Acting dev for a few other projects, working on sales infrastructure and contract development. Capsule House is my number 1 priority.

Q: Seerlight, how many other projects are you working on at once?

A: Small art projects and collars, but Capsule House is my baby.

Q: Anything we feel we will be innovators in?

A: Yes - morphing between Capsule to Avatar. Nothing close to the level of quality and scale we are going to embark on. More than enough talent to execute this. Not going to be another 10K PFP drop.

Q: Is this a “burn” for a PFP? Otherwise does this not just dilute the market? 

A: Finalizing mechanisms but we're not planning on burning the PFP. Instead, morph your capsules around by changing how they are displayed. Scheme where you can keep both. Not going to be diluted.

Q: When can we expect the PFPs to hatch in 2022?

A: Targeting for the first batch in mid to late January. Batch rollout pace is TBD.

Q: What is it in particular that inspired/continues to inspire the art style that Seerlight creates? 

A: Mostly Ghibli movies. Especially "Spirited Away."

Q: Seerlight, What do you do to get into your “creative zone”? 

A: I usually start after midnight and after I finish everything else I needed to do for the day. I turn on music or play games before I start working, which is every day.

Q: Seerlight, Where do you get the most inspiration for your art? 

A: I'm inspired by Asian architecture -- Chinese and Japanese temples. I really look up to Yuumei.

Q: Seerlight, what was your journey like? 

A: I started 8 years ago on deviant art, but just about 3 years ago I started to post on IG and grew a following there. Started with painting style and transitioned to line art, which is how I came upon his current style now.
